name: Rambunny
description:
When a quiet family of rabbits is abducted by evil space foxes, only a brave rabbit can help.
Join in an adventure with hidden traps, escape from a fireball rains, drive a scooter, face a giant fox robot, explore caves, fly in a rocket and defeat the evil boss to bring the bunnies home!

Rambunny is a 2D platform game with moderate difficulty, containing 10 stages divided into small dungeons.

Want More!?
  • Infinite lives
  • Cutscenes
  • Easter Eggs
  • Cute Bunnies
  • Hidden Traps
  • Pixel Art
  • Funny Hero
  • Nonsense plot
  • Scooter and Rocket Stage
  • Steam Achievements
  • Evil Galactic Boss
  • Own Language in Balloons
  • Cheap Game
